oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Lonnie Hill at Lawrence County Coliseum
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Dances; Hill, Lonnie; Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (blue and red on white) announcing Lonnie Hill and the Merry Go Round Band with special guest the Mid-South Bluegrass Boys at the Lawrence County Coliseum on May 8. Poster features metal photoplates of Lonnie Hill and the Mid South Bluegrass Boys.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Edan Bryant
